name: Micro Mini Skirt - LoRA
description:
A simple LoRA that implements a micro mini skirt for your female AI character.

Works best weighted around 0.6, but that's entirely up to you :)

Call out prompt tag is MicroMiniSkirt

Any issues please let me know so i can update in future.

meta.prompt: high detail RAW color photo of a stunning 35yo woman JamieCole, low angle, from front, [(modelshoot style:1.4), (dynamic pose:1.5)], ([Full Body]), (showing legs),  [(vivid blue eyes:1.3)], [(short curly brunette hair:1.3), (bob style haircut:1.3)], [(red lipstick:1.1), (black eye liner:1.1)], (MicroMiniSkirt), (black micro mini skirt), (black leather jacket unbuttoned:1.2), (black bra under jacket:1.3), (in a empty white room, (night time), (low lighting), (white wall in the background)), (8k, best quality, masterpiece:1.2), (realistic, photo-realistic:1.37), professional lighting, photon mapping, physically-based rendering, realistic, masterpiece, best quality, ultra high res, (photorealistic:1.4), highres, detail, best quality, hyperdetailed, 4k, <lora:MicroMiniSkirt_v1:0.6>
